title: bitcoinnoob
author: bitcoinnoob
content: I am sad to admit that I have 0  How Many do you all have?

comments.author: SomeoneWeird
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinnoob on June 07, 2011, 03:53:22 AMI am sad to admit that I have 0  How Many do you all have?1. Just spent around 30 though.

comments.body: Quote from: SomeoneWeird on June 07, 2011, 03:56:14 AMQuote from: bitcoinnoob on June 07, 2011, 03:53:22 AMI am sad to admit that I have 0  How Many do you all have?1. Just spent around 30 though.Baller! =P

comments.author: littleb28
comments.body: I mined 1.42 with deepbit before I switched to solo mining. Now I'm hoping for my 50 bitcoin payout.

comments.author: bitcoinnoob
comments.body: Quote from: Quantumplation on June 07, 2011, 04:09:17 AMI just spent 50.another baller

comments.author: SomeoneWeird
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinnoob on June 07, 2011, 03:58:59 AMQuote from: SomeoneWeird on June 07, 2011, 03:56:14 AMQuote from: bitcoinnoob on June 07, 2011, 03:53:22 AMI am sad to admit that I have 0  How Many do you all have?1. Just spent around 30 though.Baller! =PNah, I worked hard for those, some of them where donations from my GUI, check my sig the others I did programming jobs and stuff.

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: Enough I will say that I've got 100 saved away in a tough to access location for a rainy day. Or you know, USD collapse.-Garrett

comments.author: MrGaSp
comments.body: 73.51 + whats left on btcguild.com, not much.I made them all(with pools)..I can say i am happy with my profit

comments.author: SomeoneWeird
comments.body: Quote from: Noitev on June 07, 2011, 05:03:14 AMapprox 320. Most in bitbills ;PD: damm.

comments.author: nikion
comments.body: I have only fractions of a bitcoin, right now just trying to save up to 1 full Bitcoin so I can store it away just in case

comments.author: Litt
comments.body: how do you guys have so many?

comments.author: SomeoneWeird
comments.body: Quote from: Litt on June 07, 2011, 05:49:20 AMhow do you guys have so many?We mine, we help the community, we get donations.

comments.author: Astro
comments.body: Quote from: Litt on June 07, 2011, 05:49:20 AMhow do you guys have so many?Mined half, bought the other half.  Started late last year.

comments.author: gongcheng
comments.body: 8. Bought from others in the Saturday before the last week.The price were 8.6 USD/BTC, now it has doubled. I'm glad.
